code: import React,{useState}from'react';import'./HomeSlider.css';import img1 from'../assets/images/Front_View.jpg';import img2 from'../assets/images/Side_View.jpg';import img3 from'../assets/images/Kitchen.jpg';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const images=[img1,img2,img3];function HomeSlider(){const[current,setCurrent]=useState(0);const nextSlide=()=>setCurrent((current+1)%images.length);const prevSlide=()=>setCurrent((current-1+images.length)%images.length);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"slider",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"slider-btn left",onClick:prevSlide,children:"<"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:images[current],alt:"slider",className:"slider-img"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"slider-btn right",onClick:nextSlide,children:">"})]});}export default HomeSlider;
